MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pounce
MonsterTrait.Text: If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.
